title: The Wide window of Mr. Malone
creator_credit: George Pitt and Spectrum Associates Production
brief_description: Gives a fascinating look into the inner workings of one of the world’s great newspapers, The New York Times. Describes how the news is gathered from all over the world, how it is sifted, edited, analysed and commented upon, and how it is finally laid out, printed and distributed in the newspaper - all in one day. Narrated by Alexsander Scourby.
